resource.name: Hamilton County E911 Active Calls
resource.description:
Please note that this data is no longer updated as E911 has updated the terms of service for their website as we are no longer able to scrape data from it. 

Hamilton county E911 active calls scraped from http://hamilton911.discoveregov.com/ 

Some records have been removed to be in compliance with TN Ann. Code §§ 37-1-409; 37-1-612 for the confidential of records of child abuse .

resource.name: City Council Spatial Lens
resource.description: City council district dataset used to build spatial lens.

resource.name: 2017 Block Group Population by Age
resource.description: 2017 block group population categorized by age. Data from ACS.

resource.name: All Permit Contractors Information
resource.description: Contractors information from all permits from the City of Chattanooga. Data is provided from May 1st 2006 to current date.

resource.name: Chattanooga Marathon 5K Route 2019
resource.description: Note: Route is approximate and not the official length.

resource.name: 2017 Tract Population by Age
resource.description: 2017 tract population categorized by age. Data from ACS.

resource.name: Downtown Parking Information
resource.description: This dataset provide information about the off-street parking locations in downtown Chattanooga. Please note that this data is constantly being updated and may not be accurate.
columns_name: Rate After Exceeding Time for Hourly Rates

resource.name: Address Data
resource.description: Addressing point file for the City of Chattanooga.

resource.name: Spending by the City of Chattanooga
resource.description: This dataset contains the spending by the city and feeds the city's Open Checkbook visualization application.

resource.name: Bicycle Parking Locations in the City of Chattanooga
resource.description: This dataset contains the bicycle parking locations. It also contains the type and capacity for each bicycle parking at each location.

resource.name: Chattanooga Marathon
resource.description: Results for the Erlanger Chattanooga Marathon.

resource.name: City of Chattanooga Data Inventory
resource.description: This dataset contains an inventory of all city datasets. It is updated systematically annually and also periodically throughout the year as needed.
resource.attribution: Office of Performance Management and Open Data

resource.name: TN Building Footprints
resource.description: Computer generated building footprints for the Tennessee. Comes out of the open source project by Microsoft to map all the buildings in the USA. More details can be found at https://github.com/Microsoft/USBuildingFootprints

metadata.license: Open Data Commons Open Database License

resource.name: Combined Community Survey Raw Results
resource.description: The data is the combined raw data of the Community Survey results from 2012 to 2018.  Important to note the 2012 survey is missing questions regarding the Tivoli and Memorial Auditorium as these questions were added in the 2013 survey and continue to persist.

resource.name: NoogaNet Locations
columns_description: Name of the Location for the free NoogaNet wifi spot.

resource.name: Directory of Workforce Recruiting and Training Resources
resource.description: Provided by the Chattanooga Chamber of Commerce. This directory, last updated in 2014, provides a listing of locations providing the Greater Chattanooga area with workforce development services.
